name: Laser Ninja
description:
Gameplay:

Get to the end of the level before time runs out, but beware: there's not much of it! To gain more time get kills, play recklessly, and walljump, walljump, walljump like your life depends on it! Because it does!

Controls: QWERTYAZERTYLeft-handedLeftAQJRight
DDLJump / Walljump (hold for long jump)W / SpaceZ / SpaceI / SpaceResetRRRShootLeft mouseLeft mouseLeft mouseAim / SlowmoRight mouseRight mouseRight mouseReturn to menuEscapeEscapeEscape License Info

The soundtrack used in this game is "Internet Friends" by Andre Jetson, under the creative commons attribution license. The track was sped up slightly, from 125 bpm to 135bpm.
